bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
This bill amends the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to allow a state development company to use the economic development objective of helping small businesses achieve savings through energy efficiency to qualify for loan assistance.
